content: I estimated $120 for the weekend with hopes that it’d really be $100. Here’s a breakdown: Friday: $22.33 on gas, $6.50 on a book. didn’t end up seeing the movie I had planned to go to, and my friend paid for takeout. Saturday: $4.32 on drugstore things, $4.50 on kettle corn for my mom, $5 tip at a diner, $5 for parking Sunday: $18.77 on sunscreen, candy, and a giant bouncy ball (judge me.) $1.50 on a dress for my sister at a thrift store. $28.49 on lunch with my siblings. $12.99 on a laptop sleeve. Total: $109.40 — I did come in under budget, but I didn’t buy groceries like I planned. I’m OK with this since I didn’t plan to have lunch with my siblings but I’m glad I had time with them.
